mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLAN_VIEW ORDER BY plan_deta_id DESC

SELECT * FROM PLAN_VIEW WHERE (cp_name = #{productName} OR #{productName} IS NULL) ${statusFilter}
AND plan_deta_id LIKE '%'||#{planNo}||'%'
AND emp_name LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
AND PLAN_DETA_ID LIKE '%'||#{planNo}||'%'
AND START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{planFrom}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{planTo}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PLAN_DETA_ID,0,6),'yyMMdd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{makeFrom}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{makeTo}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY plan_deta_id DESC

SELECT a.ORD_ID, a.BUS_ID, c.BUS_NAME, TO_char(b.ORD_END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORD_END_DATE, TO_char(a.ORD_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORD_DATE , a.ORD_STAT FROM SORDER a LEFT JOIN DET_ORD b ON a.ORD_ID = b.ORD_ID LEFT JOIN BUSINESS C ON a.BUS_ID = c.BUS_ID
SELECT (#{data} || TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PLAN_HEAD_ID, 10)), 0) + 1)) FROM PROD_PLAN WHERE PLAN_HEAD_ID LIKE '${data}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD_PLAN (PLAN_HEAD_ID, TYPE, PLAN_REG_DATE, EMP_ID, PLAN_START, PLAN_END) values ( #{planHeadId}, #{type}, TO_DATE(#{regDate},'yyyyMMdd'), #{empName}, TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'), TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'))
INSERT INTO DETA_PROD_PLAN (PLAN_DETA_ID, ORD_DET_ID, PLAN_HEAD_ID, MAT_ID, DETA_QT, CMPLT_ST, MEMO) values ( #{planDetaId}, #{ordDetId}, #{planHeadId}, #{cpId}, #{ordQt}, #{cmpltSt}, #{memo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMPLETE_PROD

SELECT PLAN_HEAD_ID, TYPE, TO_char(PLAN_START, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS PLAN_START, TO_char(PLAN_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS PLAN_END, PLAN_COMPLETION_STATUS AS cmplt_st FROM PROD_PLAN ORDER BY TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PLAN_HEAD_ID,0,8),'yyyyMMdd') DESC , TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PLAN_HEAD_ID,10)) DESC

with work as ( SELECT DISTINCT a.PLAN_DETA_ID, SUM(b.DETA_QT) AS SUM_QT FROM plan_and_worklink a LEFT OUTER JOIN DETA_WORK_ORDR b ON a.WK_DETA_ID = b.WK_DETA_ID GROUP BY a.PLAN_DETA_ID ) SELECT a.PLAN_DETA_ID, a.MAT_ID AS CP_ID, c.CP_NAME, a.DETA_QT, b.SUM_QT, a.CMPLT_ST
FROM DETA_PROD_PLAN a LEFT OUTER JOIN work b ON a.PLAN_DETA_ID = b.PLAN_DETA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPLETE_PROD c ON a.MAT_ID = c.CP_ID
WHERE a.PLAN_HEAD_ID = #{planHeadId} ORDER BY a.PLAN_DETA_ID
SELECT * FROM PROCESS

SELECT MAT_ID, MAT_NAME, MAT_SIZE, MAT_UNIT, MAT_STAT,'자재' AS TYPE FROM MATERIAL
UNION ALL
SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE,SP_UNIT,SP_stat,'반제품' AS TYPE FROM SEMI_PROD

SELECT (to_CHAR((SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'), 'yyyyMMdd')||'-'|| (NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WK_HEAD_ID, 10))), 0) + 1)) FROM WORK_ORDR WHERE WK_HEAD_ID LIKE to_CHAR((SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'), 'yyyyMMdd')||'-%'
SELECT #{subData} || '-' ||(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WK_DETA_ID, LENGTH(#{subData})+2))), 0) + 1) FROM DETA_WORK_ORDR WHERE WK_DETA_ID like '${subData}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK_BOM (WK_BOM_ID, WK_DETA_ID, TYPE) values('WKB'||wk_BOM_SEQ.nextVal, #{detaCode}, '작성중')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.WK_DETA_ID, a.WK_HEAD_ID, a.CP_ID, b.CP_NAME, a.DETA_QT, a.GOOD_QT, a.START_DATE, a.END_DATE, a.EMP_ID, c.EMP_NAME, d.PLAN_DETA_ID FROM DETA_WORK_ORDR a LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT CP_ID, CP_NAME FROM complete_prod UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID AS CP_ID,SP_NAME AS CP_ID FROM SEMI_PROD UNION ALL SELECT MAT_ID AS CP_ID, MAT_NAME AS CP_NAME FROM MATERIAL) b ON a.cp_ID = b.CP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN employee c ON a.emp_ID = c.emp_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PLAN_AND_WORKLINK d ON a.WK_DETA_ID = d.WK_DETA_ID WHERE a.WK_HEAD_ID = #{data} ORDER BY a.WK_DETA_ID

SELECT * FROM WORK_BOM a LEFT OUTER JOIN PROCESS b ON a.PROC_ID = b.PROC_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON b.PROC_TYPE = c.COM_id
WHERE a.WK_DETA_ID = #{data} ORDER BY WK_BOM_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WORK_BOM_MAT (BOM_MAT_ID, WK_BOM_ID, TYPE)
values('workMat'||work_mat_seq.nextVal, #{bomCode}, '작성중')
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.SUM_QT FROM WORK_BOM_MAT a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAT_ID, MAT_NAME, MAT_SIZE, MAT_UNIT, MAT_STAT,'자재' AS TYPE FROM MATERIAL UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE,SP_UNIT,SP_stat,'반제품' AS TYPE FROM SEMI_PROD) b ON a.MAT_ID = b.MAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAT_ID, SUM(MAT_QT) AS SUM_QT FROM(SELECT * FROM MAT_LOT WHERE MAT_HOLD_STAT = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SP_LOT WHERE SP_LOT_QT_CK = 'Y' AND SP_HOLD_STAT = 'N') GROUP BY MAT_ID) c ON a.MAT_ID = c.MAT_ID WHERE a.WK_BOM_ID = #{data} ORDER BY a.BOM_MAT_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK_BOM_MAT SET MAT_ID = #{matId} , CP_QT = #{cpQt} WHERE BOM_MAT_ID = #{bomMatId}
UPDATE WORK_BOM SET PROC_ID = #{procId} WHERE WK_BOM_ID = #{wkBomId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DETA_WORK_ORDR a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CP_ID AS CP_ID, CP_NAME AS CP_NAME, CP_SIZE, CP_UNIT, CP_STAT,'자재' AS TYPE FROM COMPLETE_PROD UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE,SP_UNIT,SP_stat,'반제품' AS TYPE FROM SEMI_PROD UNION ALL SELECT MAT_ID AS CP_ID, MAT_NAME AS CP_NAME, MAT_SIZE AS CP_SIZE, MAT_UNIT AS CP_UNIT, MAT_STAT AS CP_STAT, '자재' AS TYPE FROM MATERIAL) b ON a.CP_ID = b.CP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN employee c ON a.EMP_ID = c.EMP_ID WHERE CMPLT_ST != '작성중' AND (SUBSTR(a.WK_HEAD_ID, 0,8) >= TO_CHAR((SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'), 'yyyyMMdd') OR a.START_DATE > TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') OR a.END_DATE > TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul')) ORDER BY TO_DATE(SUBSTR(WK_HEAD_ID,0,8),'yyyyMMdd') DESC, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WK_HEAD_ID,10,2))DESC

SELECT * FROM DETA_WORK_ORDR a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CP_ID AS CP_ID, CP_NAME AS CP_NAME, CP_SIZE, CP_UNIT, CP_STAT,'자재' AS TYPE FROM COMPLETE_PROD UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE,SP_UNIT,SP_stat,'반제품' AS TYPE FROM SEMI_PROD UNION ALL SELECT MAT_ID AS CP_ID, MAT_NAME AS CP_NAME, MAT_SIZE AS CP_SIZE, MAT_UNIT AS CP_UNIT, MAT_STAT AS CP_STAT, '자재' AS TYPE FROM MATERIAL) b ON a.CP_ID = b.CP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN employee c ON a.EMP_ID = c.EMP_ID WHERE CMPLT_ST != '작성중' AND SUBSTR(a.WK_HEAD_ID, 0,8) >= TO_CHAR((SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'), 'yyyyMMdd') OR a.WK_DETA_ID IN (SELECT WK_DETA_ID FROM DETA_WORK_ORDR WHERE START_DATE >= TRUNC((SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'))) OR a.END_DATE > TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') OR CMPLT_ST = '진행중' OR CMPLT_ST = '대기' ORDER BY TO_DATE(SUBSTR(WK_HEAD_ID,0,8),'yyyyMMdd') DESC, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WK_HEAD_ID,10,2))DESC

SELECT * FROM DETA_WORK_ORDR a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CP_ID AS CP_ID, CP_NAME AS CP_NAME, CP_SIZE, CP_UNIT, CP_STAT,'자재' AS TYPE FROM COMPLETE_PROD UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE,SP_UNIT,SP_stat,'반제품' AS TYPE FROM SEMI_PROD UNION ALL SELECT MAT_ID AS CP_ID, MAT_NAME AS CP_NAME, MAT_SIZE AS CP_SIZE, MAT_UNIT AS CP_UNIT, MAT_STAT AS CP_STAT, '자재' AS TYPE FROM MATERIAL) b ON a.CP_ID = b.CP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN employee c ON a.EMP_ID = c.EMP_ID
WHERE (b.CP_NAME = #{productName} OR #{productName} IS NULL)
AND (c.emp_name = #{writer} OR #{writer} IS NULL) ${statusFilter}
AND a.WK_HEAD_ID LIKE '%'||#{workNo}||'%' OR a.WK_DETA_ID LIKE '%'||#{workNo}||'%'
AND a.START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{workFrom}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{workTo}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(a.WK_HEAD_ID,1,8),'yyyyMMdd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{makeFrom}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{makeTo}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY WK_HEAD_ID DESC

SELECT a.BOM_MAT_ID, d.COM_NAME ,b.PROC_ID, c.PROC_NAME, a.MAT_ID, e.MAT_NAME, a.CP_QT FROM WORK_BOM_MAT a LEFT JOIN WORK_BOM b ON a.WK_BOM_ID = b. WK_BOM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROCESS c ON b.PROC_ID = c.PROC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE d ON c.PROC_TYPE = d.COM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAT_ID,MAT_NAME,MAT_SIZE FROM MATERIAL UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE FROM SEMI_PROD) e ON a.MAT_ID = e.MAT_ID WHERE a.WK_BOM_ID IN (SELECT WK_BOM_ID FROM WORK_BOM WHERE WK_DETA_ID = #{detaCode})

SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM MAT_LOT UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SP_LOT) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAT_ID,MAT_NAME,MAT_SIZE FROM MATERIAL UNION ALL SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_SIZE FROM SEMI_PROD) b ON a.MAT_ID = b.MAT_ID WHERE MAT_LOT_ID IN (WITH data AS (SELECT MAT_WORK_LOT_ID FROM WORK_BOM_MAT WHERE BOM_MAT_ID = #{bomMatId})
SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(MAT_WORK_LOT_ID, '[^,]+',1,LEVEL) AS element FROM data CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(MAT_WORK_LOT_ID, '[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAN_AND_WORKLINK (LINK_CODE, PLAN_DETA_ID, WK_DETA_ID,TYPE) VALUES ((LINK_CODE.NEXTVAL),#{planDetaId},#{wkDetaId},'작성중')
